name: Mighty Gemstones
description:
Get all gemstones in this match 3 game.

Slide the gemstones to combine them and create combinations of 3 or more gemstones.

Lot of levels to finish, many different missions with different types of restrictions.

When you combine 4 or more gemstones, you get a booster to destroy more gemstones, it is possible to find booster to destroy rows, columns, all gemstones of a specific type or even the entire table with a bomb.

Can you complete all levels?

Features

- Simple mechanic, slide gemstones to match other gemstones
- 4 different types of missions (get target score, get specific number of gemstones, remove tile colors, get trophy to the bottom)
- 2 different completion modes (limited number of moves OR limited number of time)
- 5 boosters items to use to help complete levels
- Each level completed
- 50 levels to complete
